azurerm_dev_test_schedule.description: Manages automated startup and shutdown schedules for Azure Dev Test Lab.

name.description: The name of the dev test lab schedule. Valid value for name depends on the `task_type`. For instance for task_type `LabVmsStartupTask` the name needs to be `LabVmAutoStart`.

location.description: The location where the schedule is created. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.

resource_group_name.description: The name of the resource group in which to create the dev test lab schedule. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.

lab_name.description: The name of the dev test lab. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.

task_type.description: The task type of the schedule. Possible values include `LabVmsShutdownTask` and `LabVmAutoStart`.

time_zone_id.description: The time zone ID (e.g. Pacific Standard time).

tags.description: A mapping of tags to assign to the resource.

id.description: The ID of the DevTest Schedule.

create.description: Used when creating the DevTest Schedule.

update.description: Used when updating the DevTest Schedule.

read.description: Used when retrieving the DevTest Schedule.

delete.description: Used when deleting the DevTest Schedule.
